TopicTitle: At what altitude will objest be removed while on rails after deorbiting?

Articles.Content:
I am trying to clean up a little by de-orbiting spent boosters. Is there a point where objects that are using the on rails physics will either be gone or crash?

Edited May 9, 2014 by possum

I am trying to clean up a little by de-orbiting spent boosters. Is there a point where objects that are using the on rails physics will either be gone or crash?

On Kerbin if they are less than 20km they will be deleted as either burned up or crashed.

Little clarification:

If they are more than 2.3 km away from the active vessel (or otherwise on rails) and are in an atmosphere with more then 0.01 atm of pressure, they will be destroyed. On Kerbin, 0.01 atm is about 23 km high.
